long_description: Built for the avid snowboarder, the women's Burton Rider's snowboard pack offers plenty of space for your gear and miscellaneous essentials. With a women-specific fit, the padded shoulder harness, removable hipbelt and ergonomic back panel provide comfort for a long day of snow play. Vertical and horizontal carry options let you tote your own ride when venturing deep into backcountry zones or hiking where there are low-hanging branches. Easy-access internal shovel/probe pocket; fleece-lined goggles pocket; hipbelt pockets; side pockets for accessories or beverages. The women's Burton Rider's snowboard pack also includes a hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately).
short_description: Built for the avid snowboarder, the women's Burton Rider's snowboard pack offers plenty of space for your gear and miscellaneous essentials.
